name: Chullu Kebab Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Chullu Kebab Recipe: For kebab Mince ½ kg Onion (chopped) 1 cup Green Chilies 4 Coriander Leaves 2 tbsp Mint Leave 1 tbsp Ginger Garlic 1 tbsp Garam Masala 1 tsp Red Pepper (crushed) 1 tsp Salt 1 tsp Nutmeg (grinded) ¼ tsp Mace (grinded) ¼ tsp Gram Flour (roasted) 2 tbsp Egg 1 Cherry Tomatoes 6 to 8 Onion Big Squares (roasted) as required Capsicum Big Squares (roasted) as required French Fries to serve
instructions: Put all the ingredients together in the chopper and grind well until smooth. Make into seekh kebab shape, give dum of coal, and pan fry. Put all the vegetables in the grill pan with 2 tbsp oil Now grill until roasted, keep aside.
